title: Image of sugar bowl as comment on empire

content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A, B, and C. A. Describe ONE effect of the idea expressed in the inscription on the sugar bowl. B. Explain ONE way in which the inscription reflects changes in European overseas empires and trade in the nineteenth century. C. Explain ONE way in which the sugar bowl reflects continuities in European consumer habits during the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A, B, and C. A. Describe ONE effect of the idea expressed in the inscription on the sugar bowl. B. skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
